title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up
descriptions:
**Get Ready for a Hilarious Family Showdown with Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game**

Are you ready to see who's the ultimate champion in your household? Look no further than Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game. This fast-paced, action-packed game is perfect for families with kids aged 8 and up.

In this exciting edition of Taboo, kids and parents compete against each other in a battle of wits. With two decks of cards - one for kids and one for adults - each player must describe a word without saying certain "forbidden" words. But be careful, because saying a forbidden word means the opposing team gets the point.

The game includes 260 cards, with over 1,000 guess words to keep the fun going. The kids' deck features familiar words and phrases, while the adult deck is packed with more challenging vocabulary. The game also comes with a one-minute timer and a fun squeaker to keep the energy high.

With its simple yet engaging gameplay, Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game is perfect for family game nights, birthday parties, or any occasion when you want to have fun together. So gather your family and friends, and get ready to laugh, shout, and have a blast.

**Key Features:**

* 2 decks of cards with over 1,000 guess words
* Familiar words and phrases for kids, more challenging vocabulary for adults
* One-minute timer and squeaker for added excitement
* Fast-paced, timed rounds keep the game moving
* Perfect for family game nights, birthday parties, or any occasion
* Ages 8 and up, 2-12 players

**Order now and get ready to join the fun!**
